name: Invasion
short: Fight off random monster encounters for currency
description: Monsters are invading and they want your currency! When they arrive, who will be brave enough to fight them off?
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.
install_msg:
Monsters have started to appear in your server! Can your members fight them off? See [p]help Invasion to learn how to use this cog. Want to add monsters or help improve this cog? Check out [my repo](https://github.com/Chovin/Dumb-Cogs/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md) for how :)

Note, this cog includes bundled data that is the monster animations and etc.
author: chovin (irdumb)
